p: Under LA conditions the response patterns varied between the species. The slow-growing B. erectus showed a reverse pattern to FA conditions with lowest SLA at 20 °C. SLA was very much higher at 7 °C and 350% higher than in the FA treatment;, and a similar level at 30 °C as under FA conditions. In complete contrast, the fast-growing B. hordeaceus had an almost stable SLA with a small and steady decline (Table 1).
